ceo_buyer.justification: On Behalf of the Board of Directors, Novo Resources Corp. “Michael Spreadborough” Michael Spreadborough Executive Co-Chairman and Acting CEO

interest_acquired_percent.justification: Interest acquired is mixed: 'a 100% interest in mining lease 45/202 and a 70% interest in mining lease 45/1163'. A single percentage cannot accurately represent the transaction.

currency.justification: The buyer is listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange (TSX: NVO) and the market data sidebar notes 'CAD|TORONTO STOCK EXCHANGE'.

cash_payments_raw.justification: The consideration is described entirely as shares; no cash component is mentioned.

share_payments_raw.justification: Not applicable as the number of shares is provided, making the payment calculable (Priority 2).

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: Not applicable as the consideration is shares only.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The Company has issued 8,431 common shares to the Creasy Group (the “Second Completion Shares”)...

issued_share_price.justification: The text provides the number of shares issued but does not state a deemed issue price for this specific transaction.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: No future exploration commitment in meters is mentioned as part of the deal terms.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: No future exploration commitment in monetary terms is mentioned as part of the deal terms.

exploration_commitment_desc.value: Initial exploration work was undertaken in late 2022, with results pending.
exploration_commitment_desc.justification: The Company undertook initial exploration work in the Bamboo Creek and Strattons Project areas in late 2022, with results pending.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: No Net Smelter Return (NSR) royalty is mentioned in this announcement.

coverage_area_raw.justification: A total land package size for the company is mentioned (10,500 sq km), but the specific area for the acquired Mining Leases is not stated.

coverage_area_unit.justification: The specific area unit for the acquired Mining Leases is not stated.

resource_size_desc.justification: The document states the project is 'prospective for orogenic gold, silver and base metal mineralisation' but provides no formal JORC-compliant resource estimate.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: Novo Resources Corp. (“Novo” or the “Company”) (TSX: NVO, NVO.WT & NVO.WT.A)...
